name: Platon
description:
A real time matching game! 

Prevent the Elements from getting to the center. Your piece has a target Element. When you shoot if you hit a different element, the two swap. If it hits the target element it destroys it and keeps going.

Destroy 3 in a row to build the Metatron's Cube. Shooting the Metatron's Cube destroys all copy of the target Element

Controls: 

XBOX One Controller:

Move - D-pad

Fire - A

Pivot - B

Keyboard

Move - Arrow Keys

Fire - Ctrl

Pivot - Alt
